name: Jumpy Kid: The fruit collector
description:
Jumpy Kid is a platformer videogame made with Unity.

The aim is to recollect every single piece of fruit to feed your village. But you must be careful, there are enemies in your road that will try to kill you.

Right now it is a beta version. Please, if you detect any bug, report it via email to d.mayoral.fernandezb@gmail.com
